metadata.title: Universal Data Type Registry
metadata.description: Catalog of data categories with handling requirements, applicable frameworks, and sensitivity levels. Used by compliance_detector.py for auto-detection and universal_classification_manager.py for marking generation.

data_types.name: Controlled Technical Information
data_types.description: Technical information with military or space application subject to controls on access, use, reproduction, modification, performance, display, release, disclosure, or dissemination.

data_types.name: Privacy Information (CUI)
data_types.description: Personally identifiable information collected or maintained by federal agencies.

data_types.name: Protected Health Information
data_types.description: Individually identifiable health information held or transmitted by a covered entity or business associate.

data_types.name: Cardholder Data
data_types.description: Primary account number (PAN), cardholder name, expiration date, and service code.
data_types.data_retention_note: Purge when no longer needed; never store CVV2/CVC2/PIN

data_types.name: Criminal Justice Information
data_types.description: Criminal history record information (CHRI), identity history summary, and related criminal justice data obtained through NCIC or state CJIS systems.

data_types.name: Federal Tax Information
data_types.description: Federal tax returns and return information received from the IRS or secondary sources.

data_types.name: Personally Identifiable Information
data_types.description: Information that can be used to distinguish or trace an individual's identity.

data_types.name: ITAR-Controlled Defense Articles
data_types.description: Technical data related to defense articles on the US Munitions List.

data_types.name: Classified National Security Information
data_types.description: Information that requires protection in the interest of national defense or foreign relations.

data_types.name: Public Release Data
data_types.description: Information approved for public release with no handling restrictions.
